MathMLElementMsup.summary: The <msup> MathML element is used to attach a superscript to an expression.

remarks.para: It uses the following syntax: <msup> base superscript </msup>.

-{{ MathMLElement("msub") }} (Subscript)
-{{ MathMLElement("msubsup") }} (Subscript-superscript pair)
-{{ MathMLElement("mmultiscripts") }} (Prescripts and tensor indices)
